original_text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him: and he was perplexed, because that it was said of some, that John was risen from the dead;
korean_text: 분봉 왕 헤롯이 이 모든 일을 듣고 심히 당황하니 이는 어떤 사람은 요한이 죽은 자 가운데서 살아났다고도 하며

sentences.original_text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him:
sentences.korean_translation: 이때 분봉 왕 헤롯은 그가 행한 모든 일에 대해 들었고

sentences.original_text: because that it was said of some,
that John was risen from the dead;
sentences.korean_translation: 요한이 죽은 자 가운데서 살아났다고 하였음이라
